name: Cranberry Pecan Pie
recipeIngredient: Whipped cream or vanilla ice cream

recipeInstructions.text: Combine cranberies, sugar, water and corn syrup in a heavy saucepan and simmer for about eight minutes, until the cranberries are tender and the mixture is fairly thick. Stir in butter, remove from heat and set aside to cool slightly.
Beat eggs until blended but not frothy. Stir in slightly cooled cranberry mixture, pecans and vanilla.

Line pie pan with pastry. Pour cranberry pecan mixture into pastry shell, place in oven and bake about 30 minutes, until filling is firm. Cool to room temperature before serving with whipped cream or vanilla ice cream.
